enumerate:
\begin{enumerate}
 \item For $\eta/\eta_s\in[-0.5,0.5]$,
   $V_u\to V_u +10^{-1}$, (curve (1) in Fig.~\ref{f:stability}).
 \item For $\eta/\eta_s\in[-0.5,0.5]$,
   $V_u\to V_u+10^{-3}$, (curve (2) in Fig.~\ref{f:stability}).
 \item For $\eta/\eta_s\in[-0.1,0.1]$,
   $V_u\to V_u+10^{-3}$, (curve (3) in Fig.~\ref{f:stability}).
